title: Transaction complete, $20s out and no RP.
body: Along with the many others buying RP yesterday, I got stuck on the processing part of the RP purchase. It seems many have gotten their RP allotted since, but I've still yet to receive any. The $20 RP was pending in my bank account for a good 10 hours before it went through, but after nearly 18 hours the RP is still absent. Opened a ticket same time as well but no word from them. Any thoughts?

replies.body: We'd like to help you out with this and see what's going on.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can take a look.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
